Gift to Kim Jong Il from Chief Executive of Interpacific of Switzerland
articles.content:
Paek Nam Sun Meets New Bangladeshi Ambassador 
    Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun met and conversed with Ashfaqur Rahman, new Bangladeshi ambassador e.p. to the DPRK, who paid a courtesy call on him Friday.

articles.title: Greetings to Secretary of Foreign Affairs of Philippines
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Chief Executive of Interpacific of Switzerland 
    Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a gift from Peter Zuellig, chief executive of the Interpacific of Switzerland, on a visit to the DPRK.
 The chief executive Friday handed the gift to Ro Tu Chol, vice-premier of the DPRK Cabinet.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Sends Message of Greetings to President of Philippines
articles.content:
Greetings to Secretary of Foreign Affairs of Philippines 
    Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Paek Nam Sun, minister of Foreign Affairs, sent a message of greetings to Delia Domingo Albert, secretary of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of the Philippines, on the occasion of the 106th national day of the country.
 Expressing the belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would develop on good terms, the message sincerely wished her new success in her work.

articles.title: Greetings to Portuguese President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Sends Message of Greetings to President of Philippines
    Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a message of greetings to Gloria Macapagal Arroyo, president of the Republic of the Philippines, on the 106th national day.
 Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries will develop on good terms in various domains, the message wished the president of the Philippines greater success in her responsible work for the country's political stability and prosperity.

articles.title: Greetings to Libyan Head of State
articles.content:
Greetings to Portuguese President
    Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Thursday sent a message of greetings to George Fernando Branco de Sampaio, president of the Portuguese Republic, on the occasion of the national day.
 Expressing the belief that the relations between the two countries would continue to develop on good terms, the message wished the Portuguese president new success in his responsible work.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Appreciates Performance Given by Russian Academy Ensemble
articles.content:
Greetings to Libyan Head of State
    Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Thursday sent a message of greetings to Moammer el Gaddafi, leader of the Great September First Revolution of the Great Socialist People's Libyan Arab Jamahiriya, on the occasion of the 34th anniversary of the dismantlement of the U.S. military base from Libya.
 Extending warm congratulations to the head of state, the leadership and the people of Libya, the message wished him greater success in his work to defend the national dignity and achieve progress and prosperity of the country.
